-1.title: The Prologue
-1.plot: Far Away Man and his sidekick, Exposition Boy, tackle a gang of thugs in one of their first major fights with crime.

imdb.plot outline: Far Away Man (2017-) follows the trials and tribulations of the world's 'greatest' superheroes - the titular Far Away Man and his sidekick, the 4th-wall-breaking Exposition Boy. The series shows their rise from local, underground superheroism to national icons, whilst illustrating a broader image of a world uniquely different to our own, with a rich history of superheroes and supervillains - and how their heritage and politics have affected the modern world and beyond.
imdb.title: Far Away Man
plot: _Far Away Man_ (qv) (2017-) follows the trials and tribulations of the world's 'greatest' superheroes - the titular _Far Away Man_ (qv) and his sidekick, the 4th-wall-breaking Exposition Boy. The series shows their rise from local, underground superheroism to national icons, whilst illustrating a broader image of a world uniquely different to our own, with a rich history of superheroes and supervillains - and how their heritage and politics have affected the modern world and beyond.
